overview:
Founder of Decode Solutions Founder of hive

A brand-building expert, Dawson Roark notes that his skills form a triangle connecting the disciplines of IT, marketing, and sales. “I’ve used technology and communications a combination we today call social media to build business and promote and attract fans.”

Dawson formed Decode Solutions in 2008 to consult on social media and mobile technology solutions.

Dawson is also the founder of hive. hive is a real-time mobile collaboration tool for teams. Add key colleagues to your hive. Then ask questions, share answers, and build knowledge bases all on the fly.

hive keeps sales teams buzzing, no matter how far afield they might be. With hive on your smartphone and desktop, you can

• communicate with team members • overcome customer objections • close sales faster, with fewer meetings.

Past…

Dawson was vice president of sales technology for Brand Fuel, a promotions agency with national corporate clients. Before that, he spent eight years as director of technology for Industrial Power Sales and was operations manager for ChatterBox, a startup headquartered in Albuquerque.

Specialties Web Development, Mobile Development, Systems Integration, CRM, SEO, CMS, RFID, DPM, ERP, iPhone Development, Social Media, Video, Audio, General Project Mgmt., Photography, PR, Marketing, Sales,
